snippet.title: Trombone Champ Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST THE GAME ON STEAM:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1059990/Trombone_Champ/

Honk, blow, & toot your way through over 50 songs. Collect all 50 unique Tromboner Cards and uncover the mysteries of the Trombiverse. Do you have what it takes to become the true Trombone Champ?

Trombone Champ is the world's first trombone rhythm music game. Unlike other music games, Trombone Champ gives you the freedom to play any note at any time. Follow along with over 50 tracks, ranging from folk classics, anthems, marches, classical pieces, and more!

- Absolutely zero microtransactions!
- Honk your way through over 50 tracks. The better you play, the more "toots" you earn!
- Collect all 50 Tromboner Cards!
- Baboons on nearly every screen!
- Improvise freely in Freeplay Mode!
- Uncover the secrets of the Trombiverse and become the True Trombone Champ!

FOLLOW DEVELOPMENT AT:
http://www.twitter.com/holywowstudios
https://www.instagram.com/holy_wow_studios/
https://www.facebook.com/holywowstudios/
